definition: (onom.) sound of the wind or the breathing of sb who is sound asleep
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
variant of 熱乎乎|热乎乎[re4 hu1 hu1]
colloquial word for hoopoe bird (Upupa epops)
variant of 肉乎乎[rou4 hu1 hu1]
variant of 黑糊糊[hei1 hu1 hu1]

sentences.english: The boy glowered at the stranger.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩气呼呼地看着陌生人。

sentences.english: Roaming around whirly world rough breath in dark.
sentences.chinese: 在呼呼作响的黑暗世界，起伏着不平整的呼吸。

sentences.english: Home around 5:00, I went to bed tired, "whirring" to sleep together.
sentences.chinese: 大约5点回到家，我累得倒在床上“呼呼”大睡起来。

sentences.english: Touching something soft, I sprang quickly back.
sentences.chinese: 摸到一种软呼呼的东西，我一下子蹦了回来。

sentences.english: You whish erections to last longer.
sentences.chinese: 您呼呼作声架设对前更长。

sentences.english: After a good dinner and a bottle of wine, they retire for the night, and go to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 在吃过晚饭，喝了瓶葡萄酒后，他们便躺下呼呼大睡。

sentences.english: Eucalyptus leaves twirled above her head in the whistling breeze.
sentences.chinese: 头上的桉树叶在呼呼的风中摇晃着。

sentences.english: One day in winter, the cold north wind is blowing hard.
sentences.chinese: 冬季里的一天，寒冷的北风呼呼地吹着。

sentences.english: If they are sleeping put them in security.
sentences.chinese: 要是他们在呼呼大睡，那么可以派去安全科。

sentences.english: The colour flags snuffled against the wind.
sentences.chinese: 彩旗迎风飘摆呼呼作响。

sentences.english: Hippo immediately went to "Xuegao" and angrily accused him of stealing the painting.
sentences.chinese: 河马立刻找到了“雪糕”，气呼呼的指责他偷了画。

sentences.english: I bike throwing, huff went away.
sentences.chinese: 我把自行车一丢，气呼呼的走了。

sentences.english: You hear this whoosh and away the elevator climbs.
sentences.chinese: 在电梯爬升的时候，你听到“呼呼”的风声。

sentences.english: With a WHOOSH and the crack of mighty wings, JAKE RETURNS.
sentences.chinese: 伴随着呼呼声和强健巨翼拍打的噼啪声，杰克回来了。

sentences.english: The whirring in his ear stopped, and Gibbons unlatched the harness around his head.
sentences.chinese: 耳边的呼呼声停止了，吉博斯解下了固定他头的绳子。

definition: sound of the wind blowing or rain falling
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
(onom.) for crack, slap, clap, clatter etc
fleeting (of quick passage time)/in a flash/distracted manner/vacantly/frustratedly
